backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a Hero section update and referencing affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up fonts, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all resume sections with conditional Projects rendering.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing a simple © 2026 notice with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Reusable layout wrapper providing section structure with optional title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive navigation bar with dynamic links, scroll behavior, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section showing summary, location, email, and optional phone in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section with email copy-to-clipboard, optional phone, and social link buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Educati: Education section listing academic history with institution, degree, location, and period.
frontend/src/components/sections/Experie: Renders a work experience section using resume data, displaying roles, employers, and highlights in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the hero banner with name, headline, and buttons that smooth‑scroll to contact or about sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Shows featured projects from resume data with titles, descriptions, tech tags, and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Lists skill categories and skills from resume data in styled grid cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, dark mode themes, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/resumeData.ts: Exports TypeScript interfaces and static resume data including experience, education, skills, and contact info.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and extended theming.
project_state.json: Defines project state for a resume website, listing existing features and issues like footer text persistence, deployment failure, and hero section alignment problems.
